articles.title: KAPPC Spokesman Urges U.S. to Stop Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
articles.content:
KAPPC Spokesman Urges U.S. to Stop Sanctions and Pressure on DPRK
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee (KAPPC) in a statement Saturday denounced the U.S. for its frantic racket for putting military pressure and sanctions on the DPRK.
					 The Trump group staged the madcap preemptive nuclear strike drills against the DPRK after deploying two nuclear carrier strike groups in the East Sea of Korea and by introducing B-1B strategic bombers from Guam. Then they brought nuclear submarine into Pusan Port and on May 30 held a missile interception test simulating the DPRK's inter-continental ballistic rocket attack.
					
					 On June 1 they made public "independent sanctions" on the DPRK and on June 3 spearheaded the adoption of another "sanctions resolution" by use of voting machine of the UN.
					
					 The statement branded this as the most hideous hostile act negating the right to independence and existence of the DPRK, and an extremely dangerous provocative act of pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula already on the verge of explosion into the extreme phase.
					
					 Saying that it is shameless sophism and the height of high-handed and arbitrary practices for the U.S. and its vassal forces to find fault with the measures of the DPRK for increasing the military capabilities for self-defence, the statement clarified the following principled stand of the DPRK:
					
					 1. The U.S. and its vassal forces have to clearly understand that with nothing can they deprive the DPRK of its full-fledged right to have access to nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The U.S., which forced the DPRK to have access to nuke, is speaking in public of "dialogue" which premises the "complete nuclear dismantlement" and ratcheting up sanctions and pressure. However, the DPRK will not be taken aback into laying down the nuke which it has already had a firm hold on.
					
					 2. The U.S. and its vassal forces have to drop the foolish ambition of browbeating the DPRK through frantic sanctions and military pressure.
					
					 American-style bluffing and arbitrary practices, by which it makes only those weak countries without nuke its military plaything, will never work on the DPRK.
					
					 3. The U.S. persistent racket for sanctions and military pressure on the DPRK will accelerate the miserable end of the American empire.
					
					 The U.S. has to clearly understand its rival and immediately stop the provocative sanctions and reckless military pressure, which is as foolish, reckless and suicidal an act as touching the fully-charged nuclear detonator.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Should Retract THAAD Project: Spokesman of Committee for Opposing Nuclear War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Should Retract THAAD Project: Spokesman of Committee for Opposing Nuclear War Drills
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Pan-Korean Emergency Measure Committee for Opposing Nuclear War Drills against the DPRK released a statement on Saturday over the fact that the south Korean military was disclosed to have hushed up the additional introduction of four launchers of THAAD, except for the already deployed two launchers.
					 The statement said:
					
					 This was aimed to pacify the angry south Korean public remaining strongly averse to the deployment of THAAD, evade rebukes of neighboring countries and curry favor with the U.S. administration to prolong their remaining days. It is another heavy crime and unpardonable pro-U.S. act of treachery.
					
					 The conservative coteries including the "Liberal Korea Party" are proactively shielding the treacherous act of the military authorities. This evidently shows that they are all traitors to the nation and pro-U.S. elements.
					
					 What provokes bitterer anger is the fact that the U.S. is pressurizing the south Korean regime to carry on the introduction of THAAD.
					
					 Lurking behind it is the U.S. brigandish nature and black-hearted intent to hasten the realization of its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region including the Korean peninsula by promptly deploying THAAD in south Korea and thus plug the south Korean regime into its project for building its global missile shield.
					
					 What matters is the ambiguous behavior of the south Korean regime reading its American master's mind over the case. This is just an insult and challenge to the south Korean public strongly urging the retraction of THAAD project.
					
					 The surest solution to the issue of THAAD is to completely nullify its deployment project and drive the already deployed equipment of trouble-causing THAAD out of south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. should bring its war monster THAAD back to its mainland.
					
					 The present regime of south Korea styling itself a "product of the public candlelight actions" should not follow in the footsteps of the Park Geun Hye group, which left only traces of treachery while being keen on sycophancy toward the U.S., by properly understanding the public demand.
					
					 It should also mete out capital punishment immediately on those who masterminded the introduction of THAAD like Kim Kwan Jin and Han Min Gu who are being censured by the south Korean public as modern-day "five Ulsa (1905) traitors."

articles.title: Oath-taking Meeting of Young People atop Mt Paektu
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meeting of Young People atop Mt Paektu
Samjiyon, June 10 (KCNA) -- Youth and students from across the country had an oath-taking meeting on the top of Mt Paektu Saturday.
					 Led by Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league, they made up their minds to steadfastly carry forward the lineage of Paektu, the lifeblood of Juche.
					
					 They pledged to hold in high esteem President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as the everlasting image of the great Paektusan nation and firmly defend their revolutionary ideas and leadership feats and add luster to them for all ages.
					
					 They also vowed to be persons of ideology and faith who vigorously struggle for the final victory with the faith that they do not know nobody but respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They expressed the resolve to be youth heroes of the Mallima era by working fresh heroic feats one after another in the drive to implement the highly important tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Present at the meeting were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ri Sang Won, chairman of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and members of the study tour group.

articles.title: Women Take Lead in Supporting Agricultural Field in DPRK
articles.content:
Women Take Lead in Supporting Agricultural Field in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Women in the DPRK are stepping up the assistance to the agricultural field amid the flames of the all-people offensive for the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners. 
					 Organizations and members of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea (SWUK) across the country are helping towards the agricultural work of this year, a year of key importance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development, with the shock brigade movement, do-good-thing movement and other mass movements. 
					
					 According to an official concerned, they sent 1.28 million tons of compost and 3.949 millions of small farm implements and farming materials to several thousand farms.
					
					 And they take thousands of hectares of low-yielding fields in their charge and are doing farm work in a qualitative way.
					
					 In particular, members of the North and South Hwanghae provincial, Pyongyang City and Janggang County committees of the SWUK take the lead in supporting the agricultural field, a major thrust in the building of an economic giant.

articles.title: Big Efforts Paid to Training Reserve Sportspersons in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Paid to Training Reserve Sportspersons in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Big efforts has been paid to training reserve sportspersons in different juvenile sports schools of the DPRK. 
					 The Wonsan City Juvenile Sports School splendidly remodeled its building and training grounds. And it also established the real-time monitoring system and combined analyzing control system to put the training on a higher scientific basis.
					
					 The Jaeryong County Juvenile Sports School has introduced scientific training means and methods into training, thus achieving fruitful results in training.
					
					 The Paechon County Juvenile Sports School is carrying on the work of studying science and technology in combination with the practice among teachers.
					
					 In particular, it has constantly updated the training means and methods in close cooperation with sports scientific research sectors.
					
					 In recent years alone, it presented several valuable essays conducive to training of reserves and solved many problems arising in training guidance.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns U.S. Moves for Nuclear War against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns U.S. Moves for Nuclear War against DPRK
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently brought its nuclear-powered submarine Cheyenne to the Pusan Port of south Korea. Meanwhile it conducted a drill of evacuating its citizens residing in south Korea including the families of GIs from June 6 to 9 under the pretext of "tackling nuclear and missile attack from the north."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK has reached its climax.
					
					 As already known, the U.S. imperialists launched a joint military drill simulating a preemptive attack on the DPRK in the East of Korea, in collusion with Japan and the south Korean puppet forces under the pretext of coping with the "north's provocation and threat." Two U.S. nuclear carrier strike groups are involved in the drill. B-1Bs conducted a provocative drill of dropping mock nukes in the sky above south Korea.
					
					 It is against this backdrop that the U.S. brought its nuclear sub to the south Korean port. This shows that the U.S. is to unhesitatingly provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK while maximizing the military pressure on it.
					
					 Civilian evacuation happens on the eve of a war.
					
					 The U.S. noisily talked about "solution through dialogue and negotiations", asserting it would neither topple the government of the DPRK nor invade it but allow its social system.
					
					 This is just hypocrisy to cover up its scenario for aggression. It only shows that its scenario for provoking a nuclear war has reached a more risky phase.

articles.title: S. Korean People's Struggle for Justice and Truth Is Sure to Win: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean People's Struggle for Justice and Truth Is Sure to Win: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday carries an article on the lapse of three decades since the June Popular Resistance in south Korea.
					 On June 10, 1987, the south Korean people courageously rose in resistance against the pro-U.S. military fascist dictatorship violating justice and truth at the point of bayonet.
					
					 The June Popular Resistance was an eruption of the pent-up resentment and grudge toward the U.S. imperialists' colonial domination and the military dictatorial rule and a just action that brought earlier the end of the military fascist dictatorship, the article says, adding:
					
					 Through the resistance, the south Korean people clearly showed that any violent repression by the U.S. and the military dictatorial regime backed by it could never check the struggle for justice and democracy and no force can overpower the strength of the united people.
					
					 Three decades have passed since then, but the resistance fighters' desire for justice and democracy has not yet been realized.
					
					 History teaches that for their dream for independence, democracy and reunification to be realized, the south Korean people should not harbor any expectation and illusion about the conservative group hell-bent on sycophancy toward the U.S., fascist dictatorship and confrontation with fellow countrymen but carry on their struggle until the traitorous ruling quarters are removed totally.
					
					 The massive candlelight action that had swept across south Korea from October last year was an all-people resistance of justice to terminate the old and corrupt conservative politics and the hateful dictatorial rule disturbing independence, democracy and reunification and bring about new politics and life.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. and the puppet conservative group may work, it is inevitability of history that justice defeats injustice and no one can block the south Korean people's struggle for getting something new.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy Is Bound to Go Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy Is Bound to Go Bankrupt: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- In a short period of four months since the successful test-fire of ground-to-ground intermediate-range strategic ballistic missile Pukguksong-2 in February, great events to be etched in the history of building a Juche-based nuclear power have been witnessed one after another in the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 They are all miraculous successes unprecedented in the world nuclear-power-building history and a great and brilliant victory unprecedented in the fierce showdown among world's big powers.
					
					 The DPRK is about 10 400 km far away from New York. But this is just not a long distance for its strike today.
					
					 The U.S. is feeling uneasy as this might be proven in practice. This is because its hostile policy will end in futile when the DPRK conducts the test-fire of ICBM capable of precisely striking any place of the U.S. mainland.
					
					 Trump blustered early this year that the DPRK's final access to a nuclear weapon that can reach the U.S. mainland will never happen.
					
					 But the strategic weapons tests conducted by the DPRK clearly proved that the time of its ICBM test is not a long way off at all.
					
					 Despite any critical contingency, the ICBM reflecting the dignity of Juche Korea and the death-defying resolution of all its service personnel and people will soar into the sky with dynamism at any time and from any location set by its supreme headquarters.
					
					 And its successful test will solemnly declare the total bankruptcy of the U.S. hostile policy.

articles.title: DPRK Will Steadily Bolster Nuclear Force: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Will Steadily Bolster Nuclear Force: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Recently the U.S. announced "independent sanctions" against the DPRK and let the UN Security Council adopt another "sanctions resolution", talking about "nuclear and missile threats" from the latter.
					 The "resolution" is a product of collusion of the U.S., which is displeased with the victorious advance of the DPRK, and its vassal forces and another hostile act aimed to check the latter's bolstering of nuclear force, disarm and economically suffocate it, Minju Joson Saturday says in a commentary.
					
					 Stating it is a great mistake for the U.S. to expect that its sanctions would delay even a bit or check the DPRK's development of nuclear force, the commentary goes on:
					
					 We had known about the U.S. scheme at that time when we started buildup of the Juche-oriented nuclear force, tightening our belts, and took the option of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force in a do-or-die spirit to face all the difficulties.
					
					 We will steadfastly advance along the road of bolstering the Juche-oriented nuclear force no matter what others may say, as it is the road to independence and justice.
					
					 High precision and diversified "Juche rockets" will be multifariously and continuously launched on this land until the U.S. finds a proper solution to the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula and takes a right option after cooling its hot head heated by confrontation frenzy.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Repatriate Detained DPRK Women
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Repatriate Detained DPRK Women
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society gave an answer to question raised by KCNA on Friday as regards the fact that organizations of various circles in south Korea are staging a vigorous action in demand of the repatriation of detained DPRK women citizens.
					 A vigorous struggle for the repatriation of detained Kim Ryon Hui and other twelve DPRK women citizens was launched in south Korea with the people of different strata involved, amid the growing demand for the liquidation of evils done by the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 But the authorities of south Korea are intentionally turning away from the matter of their repatriation, despite of the appeal and demand by the people from all walks of life, and the "National Assembly" and ruling and opposition parties agreed to adopt a NA resolution "urging" the "reunion of divided families in the south and the north on August 15", turning aside the issue.
					
					 Criticizing such wrong attitude, the spokesman said that the detention of DPRK woman citizens, who were abducted and taken away to south Korea, is a product of the heinous anti-DPRK confrontation policy of the Park group, which was sternly punished by the public, and it is an unpardonable unethical crime.
					
					 He further said:
					
					 If the south Korean authorities are truly interested in the issues of "human rights", "humanitarianism" and "separated families", they should pay attention to the strong demand of the families of those abductees and settle the issue of their repatriation at an early date before anything else.
					
					 It is preposterous to discuss on the "humanitarianism" and reunion of divided families and relatives, in disregard of such hideous unethical crimes as imposing bitter pains and misfortune on the compatriots by artificially making new "divided families".
					
					 Any humanitarian cooperation between the north and the south, including reunion of divided families and relatives, can never be expected before the unconditional repatriation of the detained women citizens of the DPRK.
					
					 We will watch the attitude of the south Korean authorities and strive for the repatriation of the detained women citizens to the last.

articles.title: Peasants' Preparatory Committee for Pan-National Conference Formed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Peasants' Preparatory Committee for Pan-National Conference Formed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- Peasants organizations of south Korea, including the Federation of Peasants Associations and the Catholic Peasants Association, met in Seoul on June 8 to form a peasants preparatory committee for the Pan-National Conference for Peace and Reunification of the Country and Development of North-South Relations, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 At the inaugural meeting, speakers called upon all Koreans in the south and the north and abroad to pool their efforts and wisdom in order to make the Pan-National Conference success.
					
					 They stressed that as the peasants removed the treacherous and anti-reunification regime by dint of candlelight action, they would start the action again for the pan-national conference and the country's reunification.

articles.title: Continued Probe into Case of Killing by GIs Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Continued Probe into Case of Killing by GIs Urged in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The joint preparatory committee for memorial service for schoolgirls Sin Hyo Sun and Sim Mi Son on the 15th anniversary of their death held a press conference in Seoul to demand continued probe into the truth behind the killing of the two girls by GIs with an armored vehicle, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 Speakers at the conference called for comprehensively re-scrutinizing the documents related to the investigation into the killing which was discontinued in 2009 and the trial concerning the case.
					
					 They urged the new "government" to continue the probe into the truth and hold the GIs legally responsible for the crime.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Britain
Pyongyang, June 10 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website the detailed gist of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Theory of Cinematic Art" with his photo on June 5 to mark the 53rd anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on April 11, Juche 62 (1973), gives exposition of all matters arising in literature and art, including the essence and requirements of humanics, literature, production, photographing, fine art, music theories and mission and duty of writers and artistes.

articles.title: ACR exige a autoridades surcoreanas la devolucion de norcoreanas secuestradas
articles.content:
ACR exige a autoridades surcoreanas la devolucion de norcoreanas secuestradas
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por el reportero de la ACNC con respecto a que se activa en el Sur de Corea la lucha de las entidades de diversos estratos por la devolucion de las norcoreanas detenidas, el vocero del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 9 la siguiente respuesta:
					En estos ultimos dias, se alzan en el Sur de Corea las voces en demanda de la liquidacion de las consecuencias de las brutales maniobras de la confrontacion fratricida de la banda de la traidora Park Geun-hye y se activa la lucha de diversos estratos por la devolucion de la mujer Kim Ryon Hui y las 12 ciudadanas de la RPDC, detenidas forzosamente en el Sur de Corea.
					
					A pesar del llamamiento y la exigencia de diversos estratos, las autoridades surcoreanas eluden de manera intencional la devolucion de las norcoreanas detenidas. Y hasta la "Asamblea Nacional" y los partidos en el poder y opositores dan espalda al respecto y escenificaron una farsa acordando la aprobacion de una "resolucion" de la "Asamblea Nacional" que "exige" el "encuentro de familiares separados Sur-Norte por el 15 de agosto".
					
					Las ciudadanas de la RPDC fueron seducidas y actualmente se encuentran detenidas en el suelo surcoreano, lo que es el producto del complot y confrontacion anti-RPDC de la banda de Park, ya sentenciada duramente por la poblacion, y ademas un crimen antietico nunca tolerable.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas estan interesadas de veras en los "DDHH", el "humanitarismo" y el asunto de los "familiares separados", deben escuchar el clamor de los familiares de victimas y solucionar cuanto antes el asunto de la devolucion de ellas.
					
					Es una cosa extremadamente ilogica discutir sobre el "humanitarismo" y el encuentro de los familiares y parientes separados, sin tomar en consideracion los inauditos crimenes antieticos que imponen las penalidades a su connacional originando intencionalmente nuevos "familiares separados".
					
					No habra entre ambas partes coreanas el encuentro en cuestion ni otras labores de cooperacion humanitaria hasta cuando se logre la devolucion incondicional de las secuestradas.
					
					Observaremos la actitud de las autoridades surcoreanas y lucharemos hasta el final por el regreso de las ciudadanas a la RPDC.

articles.title: Portavoz del CCPAP exige a EE.UU. cancelar sancion y presion militar anti-RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del CCPAP exige a EE.UU. cancelar sancion y presion militar anti-RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo de que EE.UU. recrudece la campana de amenaza militar y sancion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) publico este sabado una declaracion que continua:
					Los compinches de Trump llevaron a cabo el entrenamiento de ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC con las flotillas de dos portaaviones nucleares, que por primera vez de la historia, aparecieron juntos en el Mar Este de Corea, y con los bombarderos estrategicos B-1B provenientes de su base en la isla Guam.
					
					Seguidamente, despacharon un submarino nuclear al puerto surcoreano de Pusan.
					
					El 30 de mayo pasado, realizaron hasta la prueba de interceptacion de misil suponiendo el ataque del cohete balistico intercontinental de la RPDC.
					
					El primero de junio, publicaron las medidas de "sancion independiente" contra la RPDC y el dia 3, fabricaron la nueva "resolucion de sancion" al movilizar las herramientas de votacion de la ONU.
					
					Esos actos hostiles mas brutales niegan y violan flagrantemente el derecho a la existencia y los otros soberanos de la RPDC y constituyen una provocacion muy peligrosa y aventurera que lleva al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Es un sofisma y climax de despotismo y arbitrariedades que EE.UU. y sus seguidores cuestionaran las medidas de la RPDC para el incremento de las fuerzas de autodefensa nacional.
					
					Abajo sigue nuestra posicion de principios:
					
					Primero. EE.UU. y sus satelites deben conocer bien que no podran suprimir por nada nuestro soberano derecho a la posesion de armas nucleares.
					
					La RPDC no depondra su arma nuclear aunque EE.UU., culpable principal que obligo a la primera a la posesion de ese artefacto, habla ahora del "dialogo" enganoso a condicion de la "cancelacion nuclear total" y endurece la sancion y la presion militar.
					
					Segundo. EE.UU. y sus satelites deben dejar su irrisoria ambicion de asustar a la RPDC con la demencial campana de sancion y amenaza militar.
					
					Para la RPDC que empuna fuerte el armamento nuclear mas poderoso del mundo, no valen nada la fanfarronada y el despotismo al estilo de EE.UU. que ataca militarmente solo a los paises sin armas nucleares y a las naciones debiles.
					
					Tercero. Mientras persista la campana de sancion y presion militar anti-RPDC, se adelantara cada vez mas el momento del fin tragico del imperio americano.
					
					EE.UU. debe ver bien cual es su rival y dejarse de la locura estupida y suicida de incitar la detonacion de nuestro arsenal nuclear repleto mediante la sancion provocativa y la imprudente presion militar.

articles.title: CPME urge a autoridades surcoreanas cancelar el despliegue de THAAD
articles.content:
CPME urge a autoridades surcoreanas cancelar el despliegue de THAAD
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, se conocio que los belicistas surcoreanos vinieron ocultando la introduccion adicional de 4 plataformas de lanzamiento de THAAD, aparte de las dos colocadas anteriormente.
					En su declaracion publicada el dia 10, el portavoz del Comite Pannacional de Medidas Emergentes (CPME) contra los Ejercicios de Guerra Nuclear anti-Norte lo califica de grave crimen e intolerable acto traidor proyanqui del circulo militar surcoreano para evitar el enfado de la poblacion surcoreana y el rechazo de los paises vecinos y mantener la sucia vida politica ganandose la simpatia de su amo norteamericano. 
					
					Sin embargo, los conservadores, incluso el "Partido de Corea Libre", amparan esa actitud vendepatria, lo cual demuestra que todos ellos son traidores serviles a EE.UU., senala la nota y continua:
					
					Lo mas indignante del caso es que EE.UU. obliga a las autoridades surcoreanas el emplazamiento de THAAD.
					
					De esa manera, el imperio quiere realizar su intento de dar acicate al cumplimiento de su estrategia hegemonica sobre la Peninsula Coreana y la region de Asia-Pacifico e incorporar al Sur de Corea a su sistema de defensa antimisiles. 
					
					Lo problematico es la actitud irresuelta de las autoridades surcoreanas que se dejan llevar por el estado de humor del patron gringo. 
					
					Esto deviene un intolerable desafio y burla a la poblacion surcoreana que demanda fuertemente la retirada de THAAD.
					
					El metodo mas efectivo para resolver el problema de THAAD es cancelar su despliegue y remover sus componentes ya ubicados.
					
					EE.UU. debe llevarse sin demora a casa ese mecanismo de guerra, emplazado en suelo surcoreano azuzando a sus titeres locales.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas, autodenominadas como "criatura de la revolucion de velas encendidas", no deben repetir el vergonzoso antecedente de la banda de Park Geun-hye teniendo presente lo que demandaban los manifestantes con velas.
					
					Tienen que sentenciar la pena capital a Kim Kwan Jin, Han Min Gu y otros que fueron estigmatizados por diferentes sectores de la sociedad surcoreana como "5 traidores de Ulsa" de version moderna por haber introducido el THAAD.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza intento de EE.UU. de provocar la guerra nuclear
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza intento de EE.UU. de provocar la guerra nuclear
Pyongyang, 10 de junio (ACNC) -- Recientemente, EE.UU. introdujo en el puerto surcoreano de Pusan el submarino nuclear Cheyenne.
					Desde el dia 6 hasta el 9, realizo un entrenamiento de evacuacion de los familiares de uniformados norteamericanos y otros civiles estadounidenses en suelo surcoreano bajo el pretexto de "hacer frente al ataque nuclear y de misiles del Norte de Corea". 
					
					En un comentario individual de este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de evidente expresion del intento de EE.UU. de provocar la guerra nuclear contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y continua:
					
					Ahora llega al climax la amenaza nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					Como ya es conocido, los imperialistas norteamericanos libraron junto con Japon y los titeres surcoreanos en el Mar Este de Corea los ejercicios conjuntos de ataque nuclear anti-Norte movilizando dos flotillas de portaaviones nucleares bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a la "posible provocacion y amenaza del Norte". Al mismo tiempo, trasladaron al Sur de Corea la escuadrilla de bombarderos estrategicos nucleares B-1B para ejercitar el lanzamiento de bomba nuclear. 
					
					Tan pronto como terminaran esas maniobras, llego al puerto de Pusan el submarino nuclear Cheyenne, lo cual insinua que el imperio eleva al maximo la presion militar contra la RPDC a fin de desatar la guerra nuclear contra ella. 
					
					El refugio de civiles sucede solo en visperas de la guerra. 
					
					Hace poco, EE.UU. habia dicho palabras edulcorantes tales como "no intentaria derrocar el poder norcoreano ni agredir al Norte de Corea sino preservaria su regimen" y la "solucion del problema mediante el dialogo y negociaciones".
					
					Pero, la realidad comprueba que ese chisme no pasa de ser una cortina de humo para disimular su intento de agredir a la RPDC.
